title: The Beauty in the Castle
description: Three new twists on three old stories:The Beauty That SleepsPrince Charming is searching for the perfect princess. He finds her sleeping in a deserted, rundown castle, held captive by a troll. Rescuing her won't be easy.The Beauty in the TowerPrince Edvard is searching for a grand deed to prove his worthiness for the throne. When he spies an old woman climbing the side of a strange lone tower, he knows that solving the mystery of the tower is his way to greatness.The Beauty or the BeastBeauty wants a different life than her tiny village offers. She agrees to take her father's place as servant for the Beast and is delighted with her new future. But the Beast is far different than she imagined.
author: Cheryl  Corbin
